amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the President from making unilateral reductions to U.S. nuclear forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 112-485 to prohibit the President from making unilateral reductions to U.S. nuclear forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 179 (Roll no. 280).
